mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id, u.user_name, u.user_email, u.user_phone, p.introduction, IFNULL(ph.photo_name, 'default_photo.jpg') AS photo_name, IFNULL(ph.photo_id, 0) AS photo_id FROM user u JOIN profile p ON u.user_id = p.user_id LEFT JOIN photo ph ON p.user_id = ph.identify_number AND ph.photo_id = (SELECT MAX(photo_id) FROM photo WHERE identify_number = u.user_id) WHERE u.user_id = #{param1}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_name = #{name},user_email=#{email},user_phone=#{phone} WHERE user_id = #{id}
UPDATE user SET user_pw = #{param2} WHERE user_id = #{param1}
mapper.select: SELECT Count(user_id )FROM user WHERE user_id=#{param1} AND user_pw=#{param2}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET user_secc_chk = "1" WHERE user_id = #{idx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO profile(user_id,introduction) VALUES(#{param1},#{param2}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE introduction = #{param2}
